title: PELD (Pediatric End-Stage Liver Disease) Score Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: PELD = 0.48 * ln(serum bilirubin) + 1.857 * ln(INR) - 0.687 * ln(serum albumin) + 0.436 * (if age <1 year) + 0.667 * (if growth failure is present)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
